page.title: 04A QUESTIONAIRE PART 1
page.content: We devised a questionaire made up of fifteen questions to ask the shopkeepers at Six Bells.These are the answers given by the shopkeeper at Six Bells General Store,also known as The Spar. {1.Do you like working in a shop? Sometimes. {2.About how many customers do you see? Between 300-400 a day. {3.Which is your busiest day? Thursday. {4.Do you work every day? Six days out of seven. {5.What are your shop hours? 7.30am-7.00pm 9.00am-5.00pm Sunday. {6.How many staff work in this shop? Apart from my family no-one. {7.What are the most popular things you {sell? Sweets.
